objective: Expand BBB complaint analysis and find additional complaint sources

detailed_complaints.details: Single mother of Ukrainian origin - manager rude and dismissive, income requirements higher than published, application canceled without explanation after 2+ weeks (applied 2025-08-02, submitted co-applicant docs 2025-08-07)
detailed_complaints.resolution: Kettler apologized, confirmed applicant would have qualified, corrected income calculation, invited to reapply
detailed_complaints.significance: Potential discrimination based on national origin and family status

detailed_complaints.details: $60/month mandatory cable/internet charge, non-optional, tied to bulk service agreement, tenants cannot opt out or select another provider
detailed_complaints.resolution: Business addressed but consumer did not accept response

examples: Black mold issues at Fields of Lorton Station
Minimal remediation after tenant paid for mold test
Failure to return deposits within Virginia's 45-day requirement
Refusal to refund $650 ($150 application + $500 deposit) when applications couldn't be processed

documented_themes: Black mold issues - immunocompromised family discovered black mold in child's bedroom
Security deposit disputes - months-long delays, excessive charges
Application fee issues - refusal to refund when applications couldn't be processed
Previous manager embezzlement - mentioned in reviews

search_methods: Google Business reviews for Kettler properties

findings.details: Loud noises from neighboring units during late hours, violating quiet time policies
findings.management_response: No action taken despite multiple complaints

findings.details: Bills nearing $1,500 for 9 months, management failure to address water leaks and running toilets

state_consumer_protection.note: State AG complaint databases may have limited public access. DC AG case (drug nuisance 2014-2015) already documented. Additional searches would require database access or FOIA requests. BBB complaints (46 total) already documented.

known_cases.case: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler Management

known_cases_documented: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler (2024) - $140K settlement
DC Attorney General v. Kettler (2014-2015) - drug nuisance
Wible v. Parcel D Property (2025) - personal injury
Housing Rights Initiative v. Bozzuto (2020) - Kettler as defendant
Opiotennione v. Bozzuto (2025) - Kettler as appellee
additional_research.note: Major court cases documented. Additional small claims and tenant lawsuits would require access to local court databases or manual searches.

complaints: 4 additional personnel confirmed unlicensed (VA, TX, MD, DC, NC)
Equal Rights Center v. Kettler (2024) - source of income discrimination, $140K settlement
Facebook Age Discrimination Class Action (2020-2022) - excluded people over 50
Coleman v. Kettler (2022) - race and disability discrimination
DC Attorney General v. Kettler (2014-2015) - drug nuisance at 199-unit property
Washington City Paper investigation - hidden/misleading utility fees
Wible v. Parcel D Property (2025) - personal injury
Housing Rights Initiative v. Bozzuto (2020) - civil rights

next_steps: Expand BBB complaint research with historical data
Search state attorney general complaint databases
Search court records (small claims, civil, federal)
